front.title: Specifying a Circular Uncertainty Area Using DHCP

abstract.t: This document specifies how a circular area representing the locationof device can be returned using DHCP. The document also shows howthe data returned from DHCP can be encoded into GML for using in aPIDF-LO in an unambiguous or contentious manner.This document is a contribution to the ongoing discussion on RFC3825; it represents one possible solution to address the discussedissues.
